title: Danial Shahbakhsh
text:
Danial Shahbakhsh (; born 18 March 2000) is an Iranian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>.
In 2021 he competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%202020%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20featherweight">men's featherweight event</a> at the <a href="2020%20Summer%20Olympics">2020 Summer Olympics</a>, then became the first Iranian boxer <a href="2021%20AIBA%20World%20Boxing%20Championships%20%E2%80%93%20Lightweight">to win a medal</a> at the <a href="AIBA%20World%20Boxing%20Championships">World Championships</a>.
